summary: Pilates is an exercise method created by Joseph Pilates in the 1900s. It's a popular workout in many countries, focusing on mind-body connection and controlled movements. The exercises, about 50 in total, emphasize breath, posture, and core strength. Each move is repeated a few times. Over 12 million people enjoy Pilates, but while it improves balance and muscle tone, there's limited proof it treats medical issues like back pain.
title: Pilates
